definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

sentences.english: And please advise the price of this fabric by adding the WICKING finishing.
sentences.chinese: 请告知此布价是已经包含了作吸湿排干功能的价格。

sentences.english: So pectinase treatment is more suitable for improving the moisture absorption of naturally colored cotton.
sentences.chinese: 果胶酶处理更适合用来改善天然彩色棉的吸湿性。

sentences.english: The tape materials should not be hygroscopic.
sentences.chinese: 隔火层包带材料应不吸湿。

sentences.english: Research actuality on automatic measure method of fabric density;
sentences.chinese: 对不同经纬密度涤棉织物的吸湿特性进行了研究。

sentences.english: Highly breathable, moisture-absorbent leather lining keeps feet feeling fresh all day long.
sentences.chinese: 高透气，吸湿皮革衬里，让脚感觉清爽整天。

sentences.english: The cotton material are ventilates, moisture-absorbing and perspiration, resistant to pull and drag.
sentences.chinese: 布料通风透气且吸湿排汗，耐拉扯。

sentences.english: Fully padded collar with a highly breathable and moisture-absorbent textile lining.
sentences.chinese: 全衬领具有高度透气和吸湿的纺织面料。

sentences.english: And need hangtag of this WICKING or BODY DRY.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要有注明吸湿排干功能的吊牌。

sentences.english: The moisture absorption properties of fabrics with different pick counts were studied.
sentences.chinese: 对不同经纬密度涤棉织物的吸湿特性进行了研究。

sentences.english: Also the evaluation method of hydroscopic and sweat-discharged textile was briefly recounted.
sentences.chinese: 简述了吸湿排汗织物的评价方法。

sentences.english: Padded, moisture wicking back wall for added comfort and breathability.
sentences.chinese: 补齐，吸湿排汗，增加舒适度和透气性的后墙。

sentences.english: Sorption saturation point (SSP) was the critical moisture content for hygroscopic deformation of RSPB.
sentences.chinese: 吸着饱和点SSP是刨花板吸湿变形的临界含水率。

sentences.english: The preparation of a novel hydroscopic and sweat-discharge polyester fiber was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了具有吸湿排汗性能的新型聚酯纤维的研制。

sentences.english: The hygroscopic balance curve of the powder was determined.
sentences.chinese: 井测定药粉的吸湿平衡曲线。

sentences.english: The hygroscopic and expansion of bamboo timber were measured and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 摘要对龙竹竹材的吸湿膨胀特性进行了测试和分析。

definition: to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
porous/having many holes (e.g. filter gauze or sieve)
